name: Foot surveillance with shift rotations
evidence_hints: Time, rotation pattern, photos/video if safe
details: Coordinated on-foot observers hand off visual contact at natural choke points (corners, transit stops) to maintain persistent but low-profile surveillance while reducing detectability of any single tail.
mitigation_suggestions: Use surveillance detection runs and deliberate pauses to force awkward repositioning
Leverage reflective surfaces / incidental CCTV for confirmation
Discreetly document distinct observers (appearance, direction, handoff points)
Escalate if observers attempt approach, block, or coordinate signaling

name: Vehicle tailing with handoffs at intersections
Repeated hard brake checks directly in front to induce rear-end blame
category_name: Vehicular coercion and staged collision tactics
evidence_hints: Dashcam front; speed & brake force/ABS data; timestamp; plate numbers

name: Last-second swerve into lane forcing evasive contact then blaming
category_name: Vehicular coercion and staged collision tactics
evidence_hints: Dashcam (front/side); lateral acceleration; steering angle; signal usage; plates

name: Coordinated box-in of cyclist creating unavoidable contact risk
category_name: Vehicular coercion and staged collision tactics
evidence_hints: Rear & side cams; relative spacing timeline; multiple plates; cyclist perspective

name: Vehicle parks then timed door opening as you pass (staged dooring)
category_name: Vehicular coercion and staged collision tactics
evidence_hints: Side cam; timing delta between stop and door; occupant action; plate; door angle

name: Dual-side squeeze forcing unsafe merge or side-scrape
category_name: Vehicular coercion and staged collision tactics
evidence_hints: Front/side cams; lane markings; distance measurements; simultaneous speed logs

name: Slow roll into intersection baiting right-of-way violation
category_name: Vehicular coercion and staged collision tactics
evidence_hints: Intersection cam; signal phase timing; roll speed; position at stop line

name: Vehicle reverses suddenly toward you to allege you rear-ended
category_name: Vehicular coercion and staged collision tactics
evidence_hints: Front cam; reverse light status; gear change telemetry; pre/post distance

name: Multi-vehicle convoy pacing & blocking exits (pressure/framing)
category_name: Vehicular coercion and staged collision tactics
evidence_hints: 360 cam sequence; formation diagram; timing logs; multiple plates
